name: ED
description:
A simple platformer with a built-in level editor. 

This is an early prototype so a lot of convenience features are yet to be implemented, especially in the editor.

Has a 'test_level' that loads on startup, rename or delete it in the 'levels/' directory to make it stop.

There is no guarantee that levels made will work between versions.

Editor CommandsUndoCtrl-ZSaveCtrl-SRun LevelF1 ControlsMove Left/RightA / D, LEFT / RIGHT 
JumpSPACE / W / UP
